title: Home - Englewood Health
description: Englewood Health, one of New Jersey's leading hospitals and healthcare networks, delivers nationally recognized inpatient and outpatient care through Englewood Hospital and its network of physician practices, urgent care centers, and imaging centers.
cleaned_text: Englewood Health, one of New Jersey's leading hospitals and healthcare networks, delivers nationally recognized care through its hospital and [network of physician practices](https://www.englewoodhealthphysicians.org/), [urgent care centers](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/service/urgent-care), and [imaging centers](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/service/radiology). News [Englewood Health Earns Top Teaching Hospital Award from the Leapfrog Group](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/englewood-health-earns-top-teaching-hospital-award-from-the-leapfrog-group) Englewood Health has been named a Top Teaching Hospital by the Leapfrog Group, a national watchdog organization dedicated to healthcare quality and safety. [Read more](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/englewood-health-earns-top-teaching-hospital-award-from-the-leapfrog-group) Behavioral Health & Psychiatry Englewood Health offers both inpatient and outpatient care for behavioral health, or mental health, issues. We are committed to compassionate, individualized care for people with depression, substance use disorders or addiction, anxiety, and other conditions. [Read more](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/service/behavioral-health-and-psychiatry) Institute for Patient Blood Management and Bloodless Medicine and Surgery Our internationally recognized program offers safe and effective transfusion-free medical and surgical techniques. Bloodless medicine and surgery can improve patient outcomes and respect the needs of patients for whom blood transfusion is not an option. [Read more](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/service/bloodless-medicine-and-surgery) The Leslie Simon Breast Care and Cytodiagnosis Center Our dedicated breast care team provides personalized attention for women in need of mammograms and other breast imaging services, diagnostic evaluations, and more advanced breast procedures. [Read more](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/service/breast-care) The Lefcourt Family Cancer Treatment and Wellness Center Englewood Health offers comprehensive cancer care, from advanced screening to survivorship programs. We're with you throughout your cancer journey, planning personalized care to ensure the most successful outcomes possible for you. [Read more](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/service/cancer) Cardiovascular Care If you're living with chronic heart disease or have an acute heart problem, turn to Englewood Health's heart team. Our nationally recognized team diagnoses and treats all types of cardiovascular conditions, working with you to develop a personalized treatment plan. [Read more](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/service/heart-care) Graf Center for Integrative Medicine Integrative medicine combines traditional and complementary therapies to support your health. Our integrative medicine experts offer acupuncture, massage, meditation, nutritional counseling, and other wellness services for patients and the community. [Read more](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/service/graf-center-for-integrative-medicine) The Karen and Gary Singer Family Family Birth Place Each year, more than 2,500 women trust us with the birth of their baby. With a focus on meeting your physical, emotional, and practical needs, the Karen and Gary Singer Family Family Birth Place team offers an experience unlike any other. [Read more](https://www.englewoodhealth.org/service/maternity-care) Radiology/Imaging Englewood Health offers radiology and imaging services at several convenient locations with the most advanced diagnostic equipment, an unsurpassed staff, and exceptional service.
